summary: Whiterun\'s Breezehome now has a luxury rooftop lounge. Compatible with most other Breezehome mods
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana]
[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
Whiterun\'s Breezehome now has a luxury rooftop lounge. Compatible with most other Breezehome mods
Features some benches, chairs, plants, tables, candles, alchemy lab, bed, much drink and drugs, some food, a nice view and a fireplace! Nothing overboard, you only paid 5000 gold for it :)

[youtube]UG5WcOCFq6Q[/youtube]

[heading]COMPATIBILITY[/heading]
Should be compatible with any other Breezehome mods unless they also add a rooftop area, or obstruct the hatch

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\\

[heading]MY TOP MODS[/heading][b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26544/][color=#33ffa6]Real Night Eye[/color][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22300/][color=#85ff34]Summer Skyrim 3 HD[/url][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34570/][color=#b0ff34]Summer Solstheim HD[/url][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22287/][color=#fffd34]Skyhighrim[/url][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27189][color=#ffb034]Shortcuts[/url][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9206][color=#801a1a]Real Animals[/url][/color]

[/font]
author: Ichibu
